resource_dependency.databaseSchema: Database with tables: users, trading_opportunities, bids, trades, accounts, notifications, admin_logs

function: Fetch all dynamic data required by the frontend from backend APIs.
static_description: The frontend displays a loading spinner while fetching initial data such as user info, trading opportunities, account balances, etc., via asynchronous calls to the backend API endpoint.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon load, the app makes GET requests to various endpoints to fetch dynamic content. Once received, components render accordingly.

resource_dependency.databaseSchema: PostgreSQL schema including tables for users, sessions, roles, permissions, and audit logs

function: Establish secure connection between the backend server and PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables.
static_description: Backend server initializes a connection pool to PostgreSQL upon startup, referencing environment variables for credentials and host details.

function: Enable secure login, registration, session management, and role-based access control for users.
static_description: Login form appears on homepage when unauthenticated; includes fields for username and password along with 'Forgot Password?' link. Signup page contains email, username, password, and confirm-password inputs.

interaction_and_states.description: Sends POST request to /api/auth/login with credentials. Displays error message if invalid or redirects to dashboard on success.
Triggers DELETE request to /api/auth/logout which clears session cookie and redirects to login screen.

resource_dependency.tradingOpportunitiesTableSchema: Table columns: symbol, current_price, last_updated, volume, status

function: Display available trading opportunities in an organized table view for authenticated users.
static_description: Dashboard features header navigation bar, sidebar menu, main content area showing a searchable/filterable table listing active trading opportunities. Background color set to lemon chiffon (#FFFACD), component colors use chocolate (#D2691E).

interaction_and_states.description: Automatically fetches latest trading opportunities from /api/trading/opportunities and renders them in the table.
Manually re-fetches data from API and updates the displayed table without reloading the entire page.

resource_dependency.bidPlacementModal: Modal window with input field for bid amount and confirmation button

function: Allow users to place bids and execute trades in real-time through intuitive interface elements.
static_description: Each row in the trading opportunities table includes a 'Place Bid' button next to relevant entries. Clicking opens modal prompting for bid amount before submitting.

interaction_and_states.description: Opens modal dialog asking for bid value. After submission, sends POST to /api/bids/place then shows confirmation toast notification.
Once matched, system executes trade via POST to /api/trades/execute and updates UI instantly with outcome feedback.

resource_dependency.accountSummaryCard: Card layout showing balance, open positions count, net profit/loss metrics

function: Provide users visibility into their financial standing and current holdings within the platform.
static_description: Account summary card located in top right corner of dashboard showing key metrics like total balance, number of open positions, and overall performance indicators.

interaction_and_states.description: Loads detailed view of portfolio breakdown, transaction history preview, and settings related to risk tolerance levels.

resource_dependency.orderHistoryTableSchema: Columns: date_time, asset_symbol, type (buy/sell), quantity, price_per_unit, total_value, status

function: Present chronological log of completed and pending orders placed by the logged-in user.
static_description: Orders tab displays paginated table of historical transactions with filters for time range, asset class, order type, and status.

interaction_and_states.description: Updates query parameters sent to /api/orders/history resulting in filtered dataset returned and rendered in table.

resource_dependency.notificationBannerComponent: Top banner element showing live updates about bid modifications and successful trades

function: Deliver instantaneous feedback regarding market movements and personal activity directly inside the browser.
static_description: Thin horizontal strip across top of screen receives streaming messages about bid updates and executed trades. Uses WebSocket protocol for low-latency delivery.

interaction_and_states.description: Displays brief flash alert indicating nature of update followed by automatic dismissal after few seconds unless clicked to expand details.

resource_dependency.searchBarInputField: Text input box positioned above opportunity listings

function: Empower traders to quickly locate specific assets matching their criteria among numerous options.
static_description: Search bar sits atop opportunities table with dropdown selectors beneath offering refined filtering capabilities based on multiple dimensions.

interaction_and_states.description: Filters results dynamically as characters are entered into search box, reducing visible items in real-time.
Applies chosen filter immediately updating displayed subset of trading opportunities according to selected parameter(s).

function: Ensure optimal viewing experience regardless of device size or orientation while maintaining consistent styling theme.
static_description: Website utilizes mobile-first responsive CSS framework ensuring layout adjusts smoothly across desktop, tablet, and smartphone screens. All backgrounds use lemon chiffon (#FFFACD) and chocolate (#D2691E) accents applied via CSS custom properties.

interaction_and_states.description: Adapts grid layouts, font sizes, spacing, and navigation menus automatically based on viewport width thresholds defined in media queries.

function: Allow registered members to customize their public identity and communication preferences.
static_description: Accessible under 'My Profile' section containing editable text boxes for name and contact info alongside toggles for opting into different alert types.

interaction_and_states.description: Submits updated profile information to /api/users/profile/update endpoint and reflects saved state visually once processed successfully.

function: Keep participants informed of important events affecting their investments and actions taken elsewhere.
static_description: Top navigation bar contains bell-shaped icon badge indicating unread alerts. Clicking reveals dropdown feed listing recent notifications sorted chronologically.

interaction_and_states.description: Toggles dropdown panel visibility and fetches unseen notifications from /api/notifications/feed for display purposes.
Marks individual item as read locally and removes it from dropdown list temporarily until next refresh cycle.

resource_dependency.adminPermissionsSchema: Role-based access control rules determining who can modify what resources

function: Grant administrative staff oversight tools necessary for governing marketplace operations and participant behavior.
static_description: Restricted-access admin panel accessible only by authorized personnel featuring dedicated sections for overseeing listings, managing member profiles, reviewing analytics dashboards.

interaction_and_states.description: Redirected to protected route requiring elevated privileges verified against JWT token claims before granting entry.

resource_dependency.packageJsonStructure: { scripts: { "install:all": "concurrently \"cd client && npm install\" \"cd server && npm install\" } }

function: Define npm command to install dependencies for both frontend and backend projects simultaneously.
static_description: Root-level package.json file includes install:all script leveraging concurrently library to run parallel installation processes scoped separately to respective directories.

interaction_and_states.description: Spawns two child processes installing node_modules in client/ and server/ folders concurrently, reporting progress independently but terminating together.

resource_dependency.devScriptCommand: { scripts: { "dev": "concurrently \"cd client && npm run dev\" \"cd server && npm run dev\" } }

function: Start development servers for frontend and backend applications concurrently during local testing phase.
static_description: Root-level package.json defines dev script launching hot-reloading environments for React/Vue frontend and Express/NestJS backend side-by-side using concurrently utility.

interaction_and_states.description: Boots up both development servers exposing frontend on port 3000 and backend on port 5000, outputting logs interlaced in terminal console.
